Text: Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ nako̩la ñw abo Israe̩l kʼe̩ la ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ fʼe̩wñ awuwu che, kʼi fʼoji e̩ne̩ Nazarait

mak i ki fʼo̩la-wñ date̩ bʼOmi achiwebe̩te̩ma kpai o̩te̩ una te̩; i añmo̩ omi e̩ka ku ma nʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma abe̩k o̩te̩ una che n, i añmo̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma du n, i la aje̩ e̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma tʼe-etito̩ n, tʼe-e̩gbe̩ n.
O̩jo̩ du kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ date̩ kade i aje̩ e̩wñ du ku ma ne̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma che n, dagba i chʼe̩yo̩-wñ dagba i chʼeikpa-wñ.
Abe̩ du akadʼoji-wñ o̩jo̩ du kʼi dʼoji ka kʼi ada o̩la-wñ te̩ kade n; efo̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ afo̩ gbogbo tak o̩jo̩ kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ date̩ ñwu Jihofa kade ki jo̩; i ki tʼiloji-wñ no̩ kʼi gwe̩ jiji daru wane̩.
O̩jo̩ du kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ date̩ ñwu Jihofa kade le̩, i ñʼate̩ me̩ru oku e̩wñ n.
I chaka chʼata-wñ, abe̩k iye-wñ abe̩k o̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, abe̩k o̩maye-wñ onobule̩, ma leku i adʼo̩la-wñ ji ugbo oku-ma n; todabu kʼe̩date̩ ñw O̩jo̩-wñ bʼoji-wñ ma.
O̩jo̩ du kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ date̩ kade le̩ i afo̩ ñwu Jihofa.
I la che̩wñ kʼone̩ leku achigili nyʼu o̩la, kʼi la fʼoji e̩date̩-wñ daji, tak i alʼoji-wñ o̩jo̩ kʼi agwo̩la rinyo̩; o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ tak i ala.
Tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ i akʼamikede meji abe̩k amo̩ma o̩ke̩te̩be̩ meji wʼugbo atama, alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju,
tak atama le̩ adʼoka-wñ che iche̩bo̩ adure, ekeji-wñ la chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, oñ i ache e̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ, todabu kʼi dure ugbo oku one̩ le̩. Tak i ache kʼoji-wñ ki fo̩ o̩jo̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩,
kʼi dabi fʼaluka o̩jo̩ kʼi date̩ le̩ date̩ ñwu Jihofa ge̩, oñ i adʼala o̩mojo̩do̩ʼka wa kʼi chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ abi-eje̩; o̩jo̩ kʼi je̩ kwoubi muda kwotinyo̩, todabu kʼe̩date̩-wñ le̩ mudaji.
E̩wñ ki la chʼuko̩-o̩la e̩ne̩ Nazarait e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ e̩date̩-wñ jo̩ kpa le̩ de̩: ma adʼowñ wa alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju,
oñ i adʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ wa ñwu Jihofa, okolo o̩mo̩do̩ʼka ki mufu ki chʼutod iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, kpai ole ala o̩mo̩do̩ʼka kʼi mufu kʼi chʼutod iche̩bo̩ adure, kpai okoloʼka kʼi mufu todu iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩,

kpai akala ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n e̩ko̩ agbaʼka, kpai akala ku ma nʼomu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ che e-ku ma dʼekpo fo̩ nyu, kpai o̩kpukpulu ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n ku ma dʼekpo tafio̩, kpai e̩wñ ele-wñ, kpai iche̩bo̩ omi-wñ.
Tak atama akʼe̩wñ le̩ wa o̩gba Jihofa, kʼi fʼiche̩bo̩ adure-wñ kpai iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo-wñ che̩,
tak i adʼokolo le̩ che iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ ñwu Jihofa, manyʼakala ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n ki chʼe̩ko̩ agba le̩; atama le̩ año̩ ko e̩wñ ele-wñ kpai iche̩bo̩ omi-wñ wa che ge̩.
Tak e̩ne̩ Nazarait le̩ ala oji e̩date̩-wñ alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju, tak i akʼiloji e-oji e̩date̩-wñ le̩ nyʼuna kʼi dʼofe e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩.
Tak atama adʼo̩wo̩ okolo e̩hi le̩ kpai akala ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n oka kwef agba le̩ kpai o̩kpukpulu ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n oka, oñ i akʼo nyʼe̩do̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ Nazarait le̩, owñ chʼabu kʼi fʼoji e̩date̩-wñ la,

tak atama ami e-le̩ e̩jo chʼiche̩bo̩ emiejo o̩gba Jihofa; e-le̩ chʼe̩wñ efo̩ todu atama le̩, manyʼache̩do̩-wñ ku ma miejo, kpai o̩wo̩-wñ ku ma du nyʼate̩; ubi le̩ tak e̩ne̩ Nazarait le̩ añmo̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma.

E-le̩ la chʼuko̩-o̩la todu e̩ne̩ Nazarait kʼi doji, e̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-wñ kʼi ache ñwu Jihofa todu e̩date̩-wñ le̩, e-le̩ amanyu e̩wñ ki bo̩ kʼo̩wo̩-wñ atu; alu kʼoji ki da de̩, alu le̩ i ache tʼeju uko̩ o̩la e-e̩date̩-wñ le̩ tila.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ nako̩la ñw Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ kakini, Alu ku ma akadua ñw abo Israe̩l le̩ de̩: Ame̩ aka ñwu ma kakini,
Jihofa ki de̩nyo̩ ñw e̩, kʼi la fʼuwe̩ de:
Jihofa kʼi je̩ kʼugane̩ eju-wñ ki ta bʼuwe̩ ma, kʼi la lʼuwe̩ eju;
Eju Jihofa ki bo̩rʼuwe̩ kʼi dʼure̩do̩ chʼuwe̩ ele̩.
Abe̩le̩ ma adʼodu-mi nʼoji abo Israe̩l; oñ u nade̩nyo̩ ñwu ma.
